# Loading in NHIS Data
```{r Loading in NHIS data}
library(readxl)
NHIS_data <- read_excel("NHIS_abridged_v2_labels_Feb07.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Sheet1")
View(NHIS_data)

head(NHIS_data)
tail(NHIS_data)
View(NHIS_data)

sapply(NHIS_data, class)
```
# Converting the number columns to numeric
```{r Converting the number columns to numeric}
# Specify columns you want to change
i <- c(2,4,33,36,37,38,39,41,42,43,49,50,53,54,55,58,61)  

# Specify own function within apply
NHIS_data[ , i] <- apply(NHIS_data[ , i], 2,
                         function(x) as.numeric(as.character(x)))

# Get classes of all columns
sapply(NHIS_data, class) 
```



# Installing packages
```{r Installing the tidyverse package}
library("tidyverse")
```

# Analysis
```{r Analysis}
male_36 <- NHIS_data %>% 
  select(hhx, agep_a, sex_a) %>% 
  filter(agep_a < 36 & sex_a == "Male") %>% 
  arrange(agep_a)

plot(male_36)
```
